When did these crashes occur? At the game start? If not, roughly how long had you been playing? Were there a lot of units out?

Do you happen to have replays?

@RoosterDragon : these are maps where the "ProductionMultiplier" has been modified to have more levels ... so you can spam units even faster ...the crashes occured during the game and indeed with lots of units .. the gameplay on these maps is meant to be a "spamfest"

i still have the replays

sadly , these maps are quite popular


If you could upload one or both or the replays, that'd be super.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zhk72z9bt2sphqy/Toxic%20stuff.rar?dl=0

keep in mind that ive played those maps around 5-6 times ... without having a crash
